dpm.lejos.project

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • dpm.lejos.project.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to all the robots sensors and actuators Holds all the parameters and constants relevant to the whole system
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Lavoie-Boutin
